name: Floor Plus II™
description: Technologically Advanced Cleaning Floor Plus II™ is a newly developed floor care product that utilizes the engineering of advanced biotechnology. Floor Plus II™ includes a proprietary microbial colony and enzymatic formulation that provides superior cleaning capabilities over traditional floor care product. This technology incorporated in Floor Plus II™ penetrates porous floor surfaces to breakdown, degrade, and eliminate grease and other organic materials that accumulate over time. This newly designed formulation of microbes and enzymes incorporated in Floor Plus II™ creates a synergistic chemistry that provides long – term deep cleaning by eliminating those imbedded organics lodged in pores, cracks, corners and crevices.
